description.value: An extension to provide textual explanation of the ProposalContraIndication.

purpose.value: This extension represents the ProposalComment concept for implementations following the information standard [CiO](https://informatiestandaarden.nictiz.nl/wiki/Landingspagina_Contra-indicaties_en_Overgevoeligheden). This extension was created because the Comment concept in the alert building block and the ProposalComment differ in content.

This does not apply to information from third parties, for example a medical terminology system. The implementer alone is responsible for identifying and obtaining any necessary licenses or authorizations to utilize third party IP in connection with the specification or otherwise.
